RunCircuitPayloadSchema.description: Data that specifies a run that can be used as input for the quantum execution manager.

number_of_shots.description: Number of shots to be executed for the circuit.
number_of_shots.title: Number Of Shots

include_raw_data.description: Whether or not to return all bitstrings in the order in which they were measured.
include_raw_data.title: Include Raw Data

RunCircuitPayloadSchema.title: RunCircuitPayloadSchema

session_id.description: An arbitrary string, filled in in the request, which is copied into the reply object.
session_id.title: Session Id
